body: Your telling me that Naruto in his enraged tail beast form slammed multiple rocks into Pain’s head and constantly thrown him into the ground and survived but Choji’s: Gigantic Punch beats him? What about Nagato? What about the paper bitch or the rest of the Akatsuki? I remember that Hinata’s family was in the outskirts of the village when this happened, and Guy Sensei and his team was out of town. This comic has so many plot holes I can’t even enjoy it without thinking too much into it. Let alone it’s Choji x Hinata. Also, how we get a Choji x Hinata hentai manga before Choji with his actual wife?
Wow, this is awful. Not even hardcore NaruSaku shippers could make Hinata as pathetic as she comes off here.
@rohan121 it's not even ntr if Naruto is dead.
You telling me we wasted almost 10 episodes fighting Pain and Choujin gets to one shot him?   damn  Gimme back my time back
Chad Choji saving what little that is left of Konoha.
AHAHAHA NARUTO CAN SUCK A DICK!! EAT SHIT BOY!! THIS IS SPECTACULAR!!
